snippet.title: Rubber Bandits Launch Trailer #RubberBandits #ThatBanditsGame
snippet.description:
Buckle up, bandits! 
Get your bandit squad geared up in the armory, choose your favourite skin and prepare for the hilarous multiplayer mayhem and play:

- Solo mode or crossplay co-op
- 25 new levels to infiltrate and smash
- 3 game modes: Heist, Brawl and Arcade 
- A fully loaded armory 
- New character skins to unlock
- Brand new game content

For more news on the wacky multiplayer game, find us on:
https://www.rubberbandits.game/

Connect with us on:
Twitter https://twitter.com/ThatBanditsGame
TikTok https://twitter.com/ThatBanditsGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/KQWStpDzsC
